item.description:
As we shift into autumn let's focus on the balance between growth, harvest & storage. With the harvest coming into full abundance there are many resources to share, and food to prepare for our winter looming ahead.

For this very special gathering we will be meeting at Cordelia's Farm instead of our usual location. Please bring a raw vegan dish to share, and bring your own utensils, cup, bowl & plate as well as ideas or items for your Show & Tell (optional)


The theme of this meetup will be Balance (for our foods) and Show & Tell for participation.
Since Jen & David will have just returned from The Raw Spirit Festival in Sedona AZ there will be plenty of awesome raw stories & information to share. Please bring your raw discoveries or favorite resources for a fun gathering of Show & Tell.

NOTE: Following our meal at 7 PM Jen will be offering a food prep demo on making raw sauerkraut & fermented root veges. Please feel free to stay or go.
item.how_to_find_us: Turn at Big Indian on Rte 1, take Right onto Lambert, turn left @ farm sign

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be! Fall Equinox: Balance & Offerings
